title: Bugsplat @Riot
body: So ever since patch 7.11 launched I've been bug splatting in the middle of champ select and its gotten to the point where i try logging in and it takes me back to champ select but i cant ban or select a champion and now i have an issue because i'm starting to get 30 min. timers for "Dodging", i don't dodge at all even when teammates are flaming each other in chat, and I want this to be resolved

replies.body:
If you're getting a bugsplat error during champion select, then an asset failed to load.  Usually these errors are driver or game file related, but it could also be a security setting such as an antivirus blocking them from being accessed.

For now, stick to custom games and go through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  

Should the issue continue then our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help make sure that League is being added as an exception.

I know that's a few steps, but getting a bug splat in champ select is pretty rare so we want to make sure everything gets covered.
